subject: Small Speakers (portable!)
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Hi All, Went into my local (Culver City, CA) Longs Drug store and saw 2 different types of SONY dual/twin speakers - one was $11.99 (rectangle in grey) and the other (round ones in white) couldn't find out the price! Went to Rite Aid in same area (Mar Visa, CA) and saw Phillips brand dual/twin speakers (nice looking round ones in black) for $12.99!  I am SOooo tempted to try one of these out for the RS 12-469 I have!!!  =Judy=   Ideas??
